=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour -
2 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 40 mins -
1 hour 20 mins || 8 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 26 mins 40 secs -
53 mins 20 secs || 6 mulch |}
